title: Game just removed itself(?)
body:
Well, I came home and wanted to play league. It still was on my laptop then, but it had that 003 Error.
So after a while I wanted to look if the error was still going on, but I couldn't find League of Legends on my laptop. 
The document League of Legends is still there in my finder, but the maps are empty. 

Will it come back, or do I have to download League of Legends again? :(

replies.body: That sounds pretty odd o_O.....that 003 error is typically a type of connection error which you can generally fix up by adjusting your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but that's really odd if your game files just disappeared. Could you shoot me a screenshot of your riotgames folder where it's installed so I can see what might be missing?
